content: **knitted jumper for dog in drops snow piece is knitted from the tail towards the neck in stocking stitch and rib size xs - l ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ #snuggleberrydogsweater drops design pattern ee-798 yarn group e or c + c -------------------------------------------------------- **size** xs - s - m - l measurements back length approx 34-38-43-49 cm measured along the back without neck edge fits chest measurements approx 34/38 - 42/46 - 52/56 - 58/62 cm example of dog breeds xs = chihuahua s = bichon frisé m = cocker spaniel l = small boxer **yarn** drops snow from garnstudio belongs to yarn group e 150-200-200-200 g colour 121 ruby red **needles** drops single pointed needles size 7 mm drops double pointed needles size 6 mm **knitting gauge** 12 stitches in width and 15 row vertically in stocking stitch on needle size 7 mm = 10 x 10 cm remember needle size is only a suggestion if you have too many stitches on 10 cm switch to larger needles if you have too few stitches on 10 cm switch to smaller needles
